rooms.name: Open Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious living space integrating dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows that overlook the garden. Designed to ensure abundant natural light and energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom featuring a private balcony for relaxation. The layout adheres to Vastu principles with the bed positioned in the north-west corner and ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with integrated balcony. Oriented towards the east to capture morning sunlight, ensuring positive energy flow per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with an island design, ample storage and natural light. Features a central layout to maintain connectivity with the dining area and living space.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed ensuite for each bedroom and guest bathroom accessible from the main corridor; designed for ease of use and privacy, incorporating Vastu principles by aligning with directional flows.

rooms.name: Guest WC
rooms.description: Separate guest washroom ensuring convenience and maintaining the aesthetic flow of the interior design.

openings.description: Large windows allowing maximum natural light while offering panoramic views, in compliance with both Indian architectural norms and Vastu principles.
Separate balcony entry for each bedroom ensuring privacy and outdoor space.

garage.description: Two-car garage with integrated storage area. Designed to provide easy access from the main entrance while maintaining a modern aesthetic.

balconies.description: Spacious balcony offering views of the garden and ensuring relaxation space per Vastu guidelines.
Balcony designed to allow morning sunlight while providing a comfortable outdoor area.
